attributes.action: Please cancel / stop academic selection in 2022 for N.I pupils.
attributes.additional_details: With the stress of Covid 19 and the lack of classroom time children have had, many children are extremely anxious and worried about the entrance exams.  It's just not fair on children.
attributes.background: With pupils facing such a disrupted academic year, many children have a high level of anxiety and stress, children have not been able to prepare properly for the AQE and GL exams.  This is simply not fair on the children.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is a decision for the Northern Ireland Aessmbly and the Executive
